news.title: 美国议员奥马尔遭不明液体袭击
news.title0: Minnesota congresswoman Ilhan Omar attacked with unknown liquid at event
news.content: 美国明尼苏达州民主党众议员伊尔汗·奥马尔在活动中遭一名观众用注射器喷洒不明液体袭击，本人未受伤，袭击者已被捕。
news.content0: Minnesota congresswoman Ilhan Omar was attacked with an unknown substance at an event she was hosting on Tuesday, when an audience member used a syringe to spray liquid at her, Minneapolis police said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 共和党就移民政策与特朗普政府现分歧
news.title0: Republicans wrestle with immigration message after Minneapolis backlash
news.content: 因联邦特工在明尼阿波利斯枪杀两名美国公民引发公愤，部分共和党议员开始与特朗普政府的移民镇压行动保持距离。
news.content0: Republican lawmakers are starting to break with the Trump administration over its immigration crackdown in Minneapolis, as the party scrambles to respond to growing public anger after two US citizens were killed by federal agents.
news.author: BBC

news.title: UPS将裁员3万人并减少亚马逊业务
news.title0: UPS to cut 30,000 jobs as it moves away from Amazon
news.content: 快递巨头UPS宣布今年将裁员多达3万人，并进一步减少为其最大客户亚马逊的送货量，以专注于利润更高的客户。
news.content0: Parcel delivery giant UPS says it will cut up to 30,000 jobs this year as it further reduces shipments for its biggest customer, Amazon.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 亚马逊误发邮件确认新一轮全球裁员
news.title0: Amazon accidentally sends email confirming layoffs
news.content: 亚马逊在一封误发的邮件中向员工确认了新一轮全球裁员，涉及美国、加拿大和哥斯达黎加的员工。
news.content0: US technology giant Amazon has informed employees of a new round of global layoffs in an email apparently sent in error.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 韩国前第一夫人因受贿被判20个月监禁
news.title0: South Korea's ex-first lady jailed for 20 months for bribery
news.content: 韩国被罢免前总统尹锡悦的妻子金建希因收受统一教贿赂，被判20个月监禁，成为韩国首对同时被定罪的前总统夫妇。
news.content0: The wife of South Korea's ousted former president has been sentenced to 20 months in jail for accepting bribes from the controversial Unification Church.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 印度尼帕病毒疫情引发亚洲多国机场加强筛查
news.title0: Nipah virus outbreak in India triggers Asia airport screenings
news.content: 印度西孟加拉邦暴发致命尼帕病毒疫情，泰国、尼泊尔等国已在机场对来自该地区的旅客加强健康筛查。
news.content0: An outbreak of the deadly Nipah virus in India's West Bengal state has sparked concern in parts of Asia, with some tightening screening measures at airports.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿澳元奥运主场馆设计
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计方案，这座耗资23亿澳元、可容纳6.3万人的体育场设计灵感源自当地传统住宅。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国东海岸周末或迎“炸弹气旋”风暴
news.title0: Forecast models are predicting a bomb cyclone off the East Coast this weekend. Here are the scenarios
news.content: 预报模型显示，一个强大的冬季风暴本周末将在美国东海岸外迅速增强为“炸弹气旋”，其具体路径将决定沿岸城市的降雪情况。
news.content0: A powerful winter storm will form off the East Coast this weekend amid a boutof deadly cold, but predicting its track, intensity and who could see snow will take time to become clear.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 阿尔巴尼亚“AI部长”开发者被控贪腐
news.title0: Albania Created an ‘A.I. Minister’ to Curb Corruption. Then Its Developers Were Accused of Graft.
news.content: 阿尔巴尼亚为反腐推出全球首位AI虚拟部长，但开发该AI的机构负责人却被指控在公共合同中操纵投标、涉嫌贪腐。
news.content0: The avatar known as Diella, billed as the world’s first government minister to be generated by artificial intelligence, was supposed to help cut Albania’sendemic corruption.
news.author: NYTimes
